sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Post.css' import Comment from '../../img/comment.png' import Share from '../../img/share.png' import Heart from '../../img/like.png' import NotLike from '../../img/notlike.png' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {likePost} from '../../../../server/Controllers/PostController' const Post = ({ data }) => { const{user}= useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData); const [liked, setLiked]=useState(data.likes.includs(user._id)); const [likes,setLikes]=useState(data.likes.length) const handleLike=()=>{ setLiked((prev)=>!prev) likePost(data._id,user._id) liked?setLikes((prev)=>prev-1):setLikes((prev)=>prev+1); } return ( <>
{ likes } likes
{ data.name } { data.desc }
) } export default Post
